definitions.meaning:
[only before noun ] involving the use of skill and the imagination to produce sth new or a work of art 
创造（性）的；创作的

examples.content:
a course on creative writing (= writing stories, plays and poems) 
创作课程

creative thinking (= thinking about problems in a new way or thinking of new ideas)
 创造性思维

definitions.meaning:
having the skill and ability to produce sth new, especially a work of art; showing this ability
有创造力的；（尤指艺术作品）创作的；表现创造力的

a person who is creative
富于创造力的人；搞创作的人

creativeideas or material
创意；创作素材
